<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rectangle_menu_item"><sp_rectangle_menu_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><color>default</color><condition>gs.isLoggedIn() && gs.getUser().hasRole('x_684922_int_trav.reg_approver') || gs.getUser().hasRole('x_684922_int_trav.nat_approver')</condition><display_1/><display_2/><display_date/><filter/><glyph/><hint>My Approvals</hint><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><label>Travel Approvals</label><order>400</order><record_script><![CDATA[// only show 30 in header menu dropdown
var max = 30;

var t = data;
t.items = [];
t.count = 0;

var u = getMyApprovals();

// use record watchers to tell header when to update dropdown counts
t.record_watchers = [];
t.record_watchers.push({'table':'sysapproval_approver','filter':'approverIN' + u.toString() + '^state=requested'});

var z = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
z.addQuery("approver", u);
z.addQuery("state", "requested");
z.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
z.setLimit(max);
z.query();

var link = {};
link.title = gs.getMessage('View all approvals');
link.type = 'link';
link.href = '?id=approvals';
link.items = [];
t.items.push(link);

while (z.next()) {
  var a = {};
  var rec = getRecordBeingApproved(z);
	if (!rec.isValidRecord())  // nothing being approved - hmmm
		continue;
	
  a.short_description = rec.short_description + "";
  if (rec.getRecordClassName() == "sc_request") {
    var items = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
    items.addQuery("request", rec.getUniqueValue());
    items.query();
    if (items.getRowCount() > 1)
      a.short_description = items.getRowCount() + " requested items";
    else if (items.getRowCount() == 1) {
      items.next();
      a.short_description = items.getValue("short_description");
    }
  }
  $sp.getRecordValues(a, z, 'sys_id,sys_updated_on');
  a.number = rec.getDisplayValue();
  a.__table = z.getRecordClassName();
  a.type = 'approval';
  t.items.push(a);
  t.count++;
}

function getRecordBeingApproved(gr) {
  if (!gr.sysapproval.nil())
    return gr.sysapproval.getRefRecord();

  return gr.document_id.getRefRecord();
}]]></record_script><sc_cat_item/><sc_category/><short_description/><sp_page/><sp_rectangle_menu display_value="ITR Menu">81fc01f52f07b010dfa35e072799b6f0</sp_rectangle_menu><sp_rectangle_menu_item/><sys_class_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kennedy.hall</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-07 19:00:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>784051b92f07b010dfa35e072799b6da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Travel Approvals</sys_name><sys_package display_value="International Travel" source="x_684922_int_trav">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="International Travel">fd7e917f2f323010dfa35e072799b6d1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item_784051b92f07b010dfa35e072799b6da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kennedy.hall</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-07 19:01:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>scripted</type><url/><url_target/></sp_rectangle_menu_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=784051b92f07b010dfa35e072799b6da"/></record_update>
